[ShotCamera]>
global int $global_ShotCamera[];>
global string $global_svStrings[];>
$global_ShotCamera[0] = 2048;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 2048 IF_svWindow0;}>
$global_ShotCamera[1] = 858;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 858 IF_svWindow1;}>
$global_ShotCamera[2] = 65;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 65 IF_svWindow2;}>
$global_ShotCamera[3] = 5;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 5 IF_svWindow3;}>
->
[Playblast]>
global int $global_Playblast[];>
global string $global_svStrings[];>
$global_Playblast[0] = 800;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 800 IF_svWindow4;}>
$global_Playblast[1] = 450;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 450 IF_svWindow5;}>
$global_Playblast[2] = 100;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 100 IF_svWindow6;}>
$global_Playblast[3] = 0;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 0 IF_svWindow7;}>
$global_Playblast[4] = 0;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 0 IF_svWindow8;}>
$global_Playblast[5] = 0;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 0 CB_svSaveBlasts;}>
$global_svStrings[0] = "MasterShot_a";>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ textField -e -text "MasterShot_a" TF_svPBName;}>
$global_svStrings[1] = "C:/Shots/Shot_01/Playblasts";>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ textField -e -text "C:/Shots/Shot_01/Playblasts" TF_svPBLocation;}>
$global_svStrings[2] = "";>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ textField -e -text "" TF_svPBPlayer;}>
$global_Playblast[6] = 1;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 1 CB_svPBIncSave;}>
$global_Playblast[7] = 1;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 1 CB_svPBIncStamp;}>
$global_Playblast[8] = 0;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 0 CB_svPBUseSceneName;}>
$global_Playblast[9] = 0;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 0 CB_fcheckCheck;}>
->
[ControlCamera]>
global int $global_ControlCamera[];>
global string $global_svStrings[];>
$global_ControlCamera[0] = 300;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 300 IF_svWindowWzz;}>
$global_ControlCamera[1] = 30;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ intField -e -v 30 IF_svWindowWzzbs;}>
->
[Playback]>
global int $global_Playback[];>
global string $global_svStrings[];>
$global_Playback[0] = 1;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 1 CB_svp41;}>
->
[Misc]>
global int $global_Misc[];>
global string $global_svStrings[];>
$global_Misc[0] = 1;>
if (`window -exists SVPrefWindow`){ checkBox -e -v 1 CB_svOrthossFilter;}>
->
